author: Ryan Hogg
title: Tesla buyer says he felt "bullied" into early delivery before $10K cut
description: Tun Bhothinard said he was encouraged to take his Model Y in November, or lose his deposit and place in the queue, just before Tesla started cutting prices.
content:
A Tesla customer says he felt pushed into taking early delivery of his car, which meant he missed out on price cuts worth thousands of dollars.
Tun Bhothinard, from Chicago, told Insider he ordered … [+2092 chars]
